text: oh this bill cunningham fashion is
really marvelous just when it's kind of
gloomy in january and the fountain in
bryant park is as you saw last week just
a gigantic block of ice suddenly a new
fashion appears not new but the return
of Woody Allen's movie character Annie
Hall and hers felt hat that looked as if
the cat had slept in it it's wonderful
all beaten up for my eye it started
September of 2012 when Eddie Simon
showed his first collection for sale Ron
every one of the models had must have
been a four inch wide brimmed felt hat I
looked at that and I thought that's it
that is the signature of next year
there's no two ways about it in my mind
and sure enough it was already reflected
on women here in New York and kids in
Paris I mean if those kids hadn't walked
right out of Annie Hall 30 years after
its creation I'll eat my hat but it is
terrific that's the marvelous thing
about fashion it doesn't take a lot of
money so you go in the thrift shop in
your fight by a five-dollar old men's
felt hat and let the dog sleep in it and
the cats sleep on it whichever way it is
and then you wear it
